desc: Founded in 1929 Originally , Salon Adair has grown to be the number one Hair Salon in Carlsbad since 2006, committed to giving you the look you’ve always wanted. We have an extensive selection of the best products to choose from so you can get exactly what you need.

layout.text: Founded in 1929 Originally , Salon Adair has grown to be the number one Hair Salon in Carlsbad since 2006, committed to giving you the look you’ve always wanted. We have an extensive selection of services to choose from so you can get exactly what you need. TO BOOK AN APPOINTMENT PLEASE CALL OR TEXT 760 842 4247
